title: Bug 7330 - Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed inconsistently. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. However, all actions should be reachable from the editor, either via the context menu or the Edit menu.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' was not available in the context menu or the Edit menu.
EB: I expected the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' to be available in the Edit menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the editor view. 
2. Select some text within the editor. 
3. Check for the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action in the context menu. 
4. Check for the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action in the Edit menu.
